meaning: She is the Jnana Mudra, also known as chin mudra.
commentary: This is a very prominent mudra and has many hidden significances. Lord Shiva as Dakshinamurty, wears the Chin mudra. This Mudra symbolizes the unification of the individual soul (Jeevatma) and Supreme soul (Paramatma); the dissolution of the trigunas and so on.
